Learn By Doing: Hands-on Labs and Data Science Bootcamp

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Anaheim, Bootcamp, CA, Data Science, TDWI

Familiarize yourself with the tools, technologies, and techniques that help you derive value from data at TDWI Anaheim, Aug 5-10, with TDWI’s Hands-on Lab Series and the Data Science Bootcamp. Save up to $915 with code KD20.


 

Save 20% at TDWI Anaheim

 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
Super Early Bird Deadline: June 15
Save up to $915 with priority code KD20


 
 
 
VIEW AGENDA
 
 
 
 
 
Transforming data starts with digging in and familiarizing yourself with the tools, technologies, and techniques that help you derive value. To help you do this intelligently, TDWI Anaheim has brought back two of our most popular series: TDWI’s Hands-on Lab Series and the Data Science Bootcamp.

 
 
 
Hand-on Lab Series
 
Taught by expert TDWI instructors, this series offers practical, in-depth training on today's most widely used languages, tools, and technologies in data. Each lab provides a solid framework for understanding and applying these tools immediately back at the office. Courses are limited in size to ensure a personalized learning experience.

Register early! These sessions always sell out fast!
  • Intro to Python
  • Hands-on: Intro to Python for Data Analysis
  • Hands-on: Data Science with R
  • Hands-on: Machine Learning
 
 
Data Science Bootcamp
A TDWI Certificate Track
 
The Data Science Bootcamp will provide you with the skills and tactics you need, laying the groundwork for your journey into data science. This two-day intensive learning experience covers the most important components of a data scientist’s role.

Sessions include:
  • Monday AM: An Overview of Data Science
  • Monday PM: Data Sourcing and Preparation for Data Science
  • Tuesday AM: Modeling Your Data: Building and Assessing Models
  • Tuesday PM: Effectively Visualizing and Communicating Data
 
 
Act now so you don’t miss out on Hands-on Labs!
 
 
 
REGISTER NOW
 
 
About TDWI
 
To review our Privacy Policy, please visit our website. 1105 Media, Inc., 9201 Oakdale Ave., Chatsworth, CA 91311
 
To know more or contact us for our services, just drop us a line at info@tdwi.org.

title: Learn By Doing: Hands-on Labs and Data Science Bootcamp
content_html:
Save 20% at TDWI Anaheim

 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
Super Early Bird Deadline: June 15
Save up to $915 with priority code KD20


 
 
 
VIEW AGENDA
 
 
 
 
 
Transforming data starts with digging in and familiarizing yourself with the tools, technologies, and techniques that help you derive value. To help you do this intelligently, TDWI Anaheim has brought back two of our most popular series: TDWI’s Hands-on Lab Series and the Data Science Bootcamp.

 
 
 
Hand-on Lab Series
 
Taught by expert TDWI instructors, this series offers practical, in-depth training on today's most widely used languages, tools, and technologies in data. Each lab provides a solid framework for understanding and applying these tools immediately back at the office. Courses are limited in size to ensure a personalized learning experience.

Register early! These sessions always sell out fast!
  • Intro to Python
  • Hands-on: Intro to Python for Data Analysis
  • Hands-on: Data Science with R
  • Hands-on: Machine Learning
 
 
Data Science Bootcamp
A TDWI Certificate Track
 
The Data Science Bootcamp will provide you with the skills and tactics you need, laying the groundwork for your journey into data science. This two-day intensive learning experience covers the most important components of a data scientist’s role.

Sessions include:
  • Monday AM: An Overview of Data Science
  • Monday PM: Data Sourcing and Preparation for Data Science
  • Tuesday AM: Modeling Your Data: Building and Assessing Models
  • Tuesday PM: Effectively Visualizing and Communicating Data
 
 
Act now so you don’t miss out on Hands-on Labs!
